name: LOOK! VIOLENCE, AND A SHIP IS PASSING
name_original: LOOK! VIOLENCE, AND A SHIP IS PASSING
description:
scour the surface of this wasted and unnamed planet. you are searching for debris from a vessel that was pursued and shot down some days ago. audio recordings, or fragments of them.

scan the surface. collect the debris (bulbous, cloudy, rotating). ignore whatever the contents of the messages themselves might say. it has no meaning, or worth.

w, a, s, d to maneuvre. the rest is up to you.
